name: YouTube Extras 3.1 Time :hover & iv-promo Update
description:
Just removing some useless things like Trending, Auto Play and changing colors of elements.
Bug with screenshot, It is almost impossible to get what you want!
Setting have NOT been removed, it is a bug with this site!

additional_info:
My Patreon My Other Styles To remove Live Promos use on Hide other: , .iv-promo:has([href|="https://www.twitch.tv"]), .iv-promo:has(.iv-promo-badge-live) Experimental CSS4 :has() 
3.1
     Video icon time hides on hover
     Option to hide iv-promo

3.0
     Now works with the New YouTube style
          Note! I had to use nth-of-child and nth-of-type so it may have issues on the new YouTube, until CSS4 is implemented with :has()
2.3
     Now removes guide-notification-container
     Fixed removal of videowall-endscreen (Only on YouTube.com)
2.2
     Removed YouTube domain -moz-document
     Removed invalid changes on other pages
2.1
     Fixed Trending icon removal
     Fixed changelog organization
     Fixed spelling of "Accent" 
2.0
     Changing to global to allow modification of external YouTube videos.  Non-Global option is available.
1.5
     Changed z-index of .audio_only_div to 10, below the annotations and stats for nerds plus many other YT elements.
     Now removes the audio only notification on hover or active from Audio Only Youtube (offered by phantom)  This extension allows people to listen to YouTube while throttled by an ISP and saves bandwidth!

1.4  !important
     Now Removes YouTube Movies without removing the whole sidebar
1.3
     Now Removes link for Adblock for Youtube
1.2
     Now Removes YouTube Movies

style_settings.label: Hide promo popups (blank or space to disable this)
